tns:projectTemplate.name: Flex4 + Signals
tns:projectTemplate.description:
Included with this template is the Signals Library - v 0.7.
'Signals are light-weight, strongly-typed AS3 messaging tools. Wire your application with better APIs and less boilerplate than AS3 Events.'
For more info see the Signals homepage on github: http://github.com/robertpenner/as3-signals
